channel.title: Everytime i try to load PI client
channel.description:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Gui Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Gui at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: Gui. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .
here is code that i use for running @echo off Title MIA Client V1 "C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx512m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 pause

item.title: Everytime i try to load PI client
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Gui
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Gui
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
Could not find the main class: Gui. Program will exit.
Press any key to continue . . .

here is code that i use for running
@echo off
Title MIA Client V1
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe” -Xmx512m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32
pause

Read full topic
item.source: Everytime i try to load PI client
